title: Print, 1664
inscribed:
Engraved on the plate at the lower left of the banner:  "Israel Silvestre del, et sculp."
Flanked by:  "Comparse des quatre saisons, avec leur suitte de concertans, et de bergers portans les plats pendant le recit des uns et des autresdeuant le Roy, et les Reynes.
Numbered at lower right of banner: "5"
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal rectangle:  In the foreground a frieze of the back of an audience.  Musicians, a horse, an elephant, a camel and a bear on the stage.  A banquet table in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, 1664.
1664. Black ink on rolled paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-86-53.
